Package io.crums.sldg.packs

Class TrailPackBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.packs.TrailPackBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.crums.io.Serial, TrailBag
public class TrailPackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrailBag, io.crums.io.Serial
A mutable TrailBag whose serial form can be loaded as an immutable TrailPack.

    • addAll

      public int addAll​(TrailPack pack)

    • addTrail

      public boolean addTrail​(long rowNumber, io.crums.model.CrumTrail trail) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, HashConflictException
      Adds the given trail for the rowNumber. Verifies hash structure. Enforces crumtrails paired with rows have witness times in ascending order.
      Returns:
      true iff the trail was added.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if trail is out-of-sequence with existing state
      HashConflictException - if trail is malformed (not self-consistent)

    • trailedRows

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> trailedRows()
      Description copied from interface: TrailBag
      Returns the rows with annotated crumtrails.
      Specified by:
      trailedRows in interface TrailBag
      Returns:
      non-null list of positive, strictly ascending row numbers

    • crumTrail

      public io.crums.model.CrumTrail crumTrail​(long rowNumber)
      Description copied from interface: TrailBag
      Returns the crumtrail for the given rowNumber. The given row number is one of the TrailBag.trailedRows().
      Specified by:
      crumTrail in interface TrailBag
